New Records: Manny Machado tied Nate Colbert for San Diego's career record with 163 home runs.
Key Match Events: Manny Machado homered twice, including a solo shot in the first inning and another in the eighth inning.
Luis Arraez and Fernando Tatis Jr. opened with singles and both scored on a throwing error.
Michael Conforto hit a home run for the Giants in the sixth inning.
Michael King held the Giants to one run and six hits in six innings, striking out eight.
Post-Match Reflections: Manny Machado expressed that it was special to achieve the record in front of the home crowd.
Manager Mike Shildt praised Machado's accomplishment and called his second home run a 'big boy home run'.
Giants manager Bob Melvin acknowledged Machado as a big-time player in big-time situations.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Padres CF Jackson Merrill left the game with a bruised left patella.
Giants RHP Logan Webb and Padres RHP Dylan Cease are scheduled to start the next game.
